Verses.22:
While they were eating, Jesus took some bread. After blessing it, He broke it, and gave it to those eating, saying,
	"Take it; this is My body."
Verses.23: Then He took a cup, and after giving thanks for it, He gave it to them, and they all drank from it.
Verses.24: "This is My blood of the covenant, which is being poured out for many," He said to them.
Verses.25: "Truly, I tell you, I will not drink again the fruit of the vine until that day when I drink it afresh in the Kingdom of God."
Verses.26: After singing a hymn, they left to go to the Mount of Olives.

Changes: 2021-10-02 - Paul Prins: First translation of chapter 12:22-26.
